short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-08-15 at 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Solicitation Information

* **Reference Number**: WS4130714560
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4130714560
* **Publication Date**: August 3rd, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 15th, 2023 (14:00 EDT)

#### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End-User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
	+ Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada
* **Location**: Naval Air Weapons Station China Lake, California
* **Duration**: September 17th, 2023 - October 21st, 2023
* **Requirements**: Provision of 101 bed spaces in single occupancy rooms within a ten-mile radius of the Naval Air Weapons Station China Lake, California.

#### Notice Details

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada has signed trade agreements with several countries, including the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

#### Contact Information

* **Name**: Andrew Denbeigh (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: andrew.denbeigh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Additional Information

* **Notice URL**: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17067237?extsite=MTcwNjcyMzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
* **Attachment**: None
* **Tender Status**: Expired

The Department of National Defence requires the provision of hotel services for the period of September 17th, 2023 to October 21st, 2023. The property must be located within a ten-mile radius of the Naval Air Weapons Station China Lake, California, and must provide 101 bed spaces in single occupancy rooms. The Canada intends to award one contract to meet this requirement. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by August 15th,
